Designing for Designers since 2013

Brand new and based at KAIST in the Republic of Korea. We are looking for students with an interest in building the future design tools. Contact us for information.

This space is reserved for future use ;)

about

In Meta Industrial Design we look at users as the designers of their own life.

We innovate in open design, physical design tools, custom design as service and local manufacturing using digital fabrication.

Follow @saakes

contact

MID lab is based at the department of Industrial Design at KAIST Korea. We are one hour from Seoul. How to get here.

Address: MIDlab, id KAIST, room 417~9, bldg N25, 291 daehak-ro yuseong-gu, Daejeon 305-701, Republic of Korea
Tel: +82 (0) 42 350 4525
Tel: +82 (0) 42 350 4502 (Korean)
Fax: +82 (0) 42 350 4510
